title: Handling dangerous chemicals: acids
brief_description: Shows the viscosity of concentrated acids, effects of nitric hydrochloric and sulphuric acids on skin and on clothing. Demonstrates the proper techniques for diluting concentrated acids and the use of emergency fountains to flush acids from the face and eyes.
description: Shows the viscosity of concentrated acids, effects of nitric hydrochloric and sulphuric acids on skin and on clothing. Demonstrates the proper techniques for diluting concentrated acids and the use of emergency fountains to flush acids from the face and eyes.
